title: 服务端开启失败的原因
author: Zero2p1us
txt_content:
如题，最近想开一个服务器折腾一下和朋友一下联机玩耍，结果出现了下面这些情况，各位康康是什么原因造成的8
Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx4G
The specified size exceeds the maximum representable size.
Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.
Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.复制代码

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
你安装了 32 位的 java ，换成 64 位了就好了
https://javadl.oracle.com/webapp ... 014bb8e3e8324f81b43

或者启动参数中去掉 -Xmx4G
